content:
The auto claim business processes use the Auto Claim product model when creating, updating, and adjudicating claims.

The auto claims business processes use the Auto Claim claim product model to structure the data in a claim. The product also includes Claim Workflow Rules that are important to the processing of claims.

Involved Property Spec: Claim Involved Vehicle
Claimant Spec describes people involved in the claim who suffered a loss and are seeking coverage for that loss.
Claim Participant Spec is used by claims to describe people involved in the claim who are participants, but not claimants who suffered a loss.
Coverages in Auto Claims Products define the coverages that can be handled by this claim product.

Attributes for Auto Claims Products are defined in the Vlocity Attribute Designer and include attribute categories. Claim Workflow Rules automate tasks for creating a claim record at runtime.
title: Auto Claims Product Model Overview
